hypotheses.title: Implement metrics collection for function calls
hypotheses.description: Add logging and metric tracking to record the frequency, duration, and outcome of function calls. This data can be used to monitor performance bottlenecks and usage patterns, aiding in future optimizations.

hypotheses.title: Improve CLI UX with clearer help messages
hypotheses.description: Update command-line interface help text to provide more informative and context-aware error messages, ensuring users understand how to use the tool effectively.

hypotheses.title: Abstract out shared utility functions into a separate module
hypotheses.description: Refactor commonly used utilities such as logging, configuration management, and error handling into a dedicated abstract layer. This improves separation of concerns by centralizing functionality.

hypotheses.title: Improve Fibonacci function implementation for performance efficiency
hypotheses.description: Optimize the implementation of `fibonacci` recursive call by using memoization to improve time complexity from exponential to polynomial. This can make long-term planning more manageable and reduce execution time significantly.

hypotheses.title: Enhance unit test coverage for error boundaries in math functions
hypotheses.description: Write unit tests to cover edge cases and error scenarios (e.g., division by zero) for all mathematical operations to ensure robustness.

parsed.rationale: Among the hypotheses, 'Improve CLI UX with clearer help messages' (H2) has a high net score and focuses on an axis that hasn't been covered in previous iterations. Additionally, improving user experience directly benefits end-users by providing better guidance.
